text: Larry D. Mann (18 December 1922 - 6 January 2014) was a Canadian actor. He was known for his voice role as Rudolph on Rudolph the Red Nose Reindeer. Mann died on 6 January 2014 at his home in Los Angeles. He died from Alzheimer's disease. He was aged 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * Larry D. title: Larry D. Mann
